participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and driven, Emily values her personal relationships and is deeply committed to her professional goals.
participant_1.background: My parents are very supportive of me, and they always encourage me to make healthy choices. I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything. I have a cheap car my dad gave me. I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am. I started working at Google last week on self driving car research.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, Jake enjoys sharing light-hearted moments with his family and looks forward to new challenges ahead.
participant_2.background: I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good. My glasses are always dirty and I can't seem to get them clean. I am thin.

content.text: Hello! I hope your day is going well.
Hi! Mine is great, thanks! How about yours?
It's going well so far, thanks! I just started working at Google last week on self driving car research.
That's so cool! I'm starting an internship in engineering later this year, so I'm excited to get my foot in the door.
That's awesome! What kind of engineering?
I'm going to be doing civil engineering, focusing on renewable energy.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
Oh, cool! I grew up in the South, so Christmas was also a big deal.
What was your favorite part of Christmas?
I loved spending time with my family and eating all the delicious food!
Me too! I also loved watching Christmas movies with my family.
I love all the classic Christmas movies, but my favorite is probably Home Alone.
That's a great choice! I love that movie too.
Me too! It's so funny and heartwarming.
I agree! It's the perfect Christmas movie
